class EAC11ReqImpl: botan.cert.cvc.cvc_gen_cert.EAC11genCVC!(EAC11ReqImpl).EAC11genCVC, botan.cert.cvc.signed_obj.SignedObject;
This class represents TR03110 v1.1 EAC CV Certificate Requests.
